articles.author: Akshat Gaur
articles.title: ODI World Cup 2023: Aakash Chopra reveals his XI for India's opening clash against Australia - Cricket Times
articles.description: Aakash Chopra has picked his India XI for the ODI World Cup 2023 clash against Australia. India will begin their World Cup campaign against the Aussies on October 8 in Chennai.
articles.content: Cricket enthusiasts and fans worldwide are eagerly awaiting the ODI World Cup 2023, set to be played in India from October 5 to November 19. Ahead of the start of the tournament, many experts have re… [+3679 chars]
